title: What are the values of assets for probate
hint1: You can find these values in the letter HMRC sent you.
hint2: The values you enter must be whole numbers and must not include decimals full stops and commas. for example 25000, not 25,000
grossHint400: Gross value of assets for probate in £
netHint400: Net value for probate for probate in £

grossValueField.invalidCurrencyFormat: Gross value must be a whole number or a number with 2 decimal places

netValueField.invalidCurrencyFormat: Net value must be a whole number or a number with 2 decimal places
netValueField.netValueGreaterThanGross: The net amount can’t be greater than the gross amount
